alert.note: Alert for Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Reno County through 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Hutchinson, moving northeast at 5 mph. Additional strong storms were located near Abbyville and Plevna. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, South Hutchinson, Buhler, Nickerson, Arlington, Turon, Partridge, Sylvia, Plevna, Abbyville, Yoder, Willowbrook, Langdon and Hutchinson Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
